page.name: Session 2: Learning Objectives
page.intro: Terminal Objectives (TOs) and Enabling Objectives (EOs)
page.content:
Terminal Objectives (TOs) and Enabling Objectives (EOs)

Session 2: Resources for Integrating Workforce Preparation Activities

TO: Explore resources available to help you incorporate workforce preparation activities into your curriculum and instruction.

EOs:

2-1: Describe the purpose and key features of the Employability Skills Framework.

2-2: Describe the purpose and key features of the Transitions Integration Framework (TIF).

2-3: Describe the purpose and key features of the Guide to ELA Classroom Activities that Promote Life Skills, College, and Career Readiness.

2-4: Describe the purpose and key features of the North Carolina Network for Excellence in Teaching (NC-NET) Employability Skills Resource Toolkit.)

2-5: Describe the purpose and key features of three digital literacy resources.

Continue to Employability Skills Framework
